oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regioselective synthesis of substituted pterocarpans and pterocarpenes. Lewis acid Ti(IV) promoted formal (3+2) cycloaddition reactions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURUGESH, MG
SUBBURAJ, K
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A synthesis of novel pterocarpans (8a-e, 10a-e and 11a-e) and pterocarpenes (7a-d and 9a-c) has been carried out. This method involves the Lewis acid Ti (TV) promoted formal (3+2) cycloaddition reaction of 2-alkoxy-1,4-benzoquinones (6a-c) with appropriately substituted 2H-chromenes (1a-b, 2a-b and 5) at -78 degrees C.
